answers.answer: We cannot evaluate nor exam you over the Internet. Call your doctor and set an appointment for a complete health checkup. Since you posted on the diabetes forum, yet provide us with no information to work with, seeing you doctor is the best advice we can offer. Good luck -

I am so glad to see you tell these posters that they cannot be diagnosed over the Internet and need to see a doctor! I am constantly amazed at how many people will decide that they can get enough information over the Internet and will trust someone they don't even know to diagnose their symptoms! Thank you for your rational postings.
I am a diabetic as well. I have noticed "with me" if my numbers are too high my vision is blurred more than usual and I have headaches as well. But, like WaveRider stated it is good to see a doctore.

question: I have blurred vision thatcomes and goes and I have costant headaches and my eyes hurt. What could be causing this?
title: blurred vision and constant headaches
